Property.name: SSUnlocked
Property.HelpText: Select what condition you want to make Super Sonic / Shadow playable.

Property.name: RemoveLimitations
Property.HelpText: Remove the 50 rings needed and ring drop.

Property.name: transfoIntro
Property.HelpText: Show a short animation when transforming with the Chaos Emeralds.

Property.name: AlwaysSuperSonic
Property.HelpText: Sonic will always be in Super Form.

Property.name: AlwaysSuperShadow
Property.HelpText: Shadow will always be in Super Form.

Property.name: isPhysics
Property.HelpText: Use more powerful physics for Super Sonic. (in Vanilla, Super Sonic uses Sonic's regular physics.)

Property.name: isFly
Property.HelpText: Allow Super Sonic / Shadow to fly.

Property.name: AllowSuperAttacks
Property.HelpText: Allow Chaos Control in 1P (Hold Y / Triangle + X / Square at the same time).

Property.name: boostBtn
Property.HelpText: Select the boost button, (only work when flying).

Property.name: SADXAura
Property.HelpText: Display SADX Super Aura instead of the SA2 one.

Property.name: isUpgrade
Property.HelpText: In the base game, Super Sonic and Shadow don't show any upgrade, this option allows to see them.

Property.name: isJiggle
Property.HelpText: This option is exclusively for skin mod that needs the jiggle disabled, if insure, leave this enabled.

Property.name: lifeIcon
Property.HelpText: Show Super Sonic / Shadow life icon and one up when transformed.

Property.name: SuperMusicVersionSS
Property.HelpText: Select which music you would like with Super Sonic.

Property.name: SuperMusicVersionSSH
Property.HelpText: Select which music you would like with Super Shadow.
